poems.title: Realm of Dragons
poems.author: Liam Harrison
poems.excerpt: In the realm of dragons, where fire meets sky...
poems.full_text: In the realm of dragons, where fire meets sky. Wings of myth, scales of shimmering gold, a world of ancient tales and untold wonders. Dare to dream, for in fantasy's embrace, legends come alive.

poems.title: Enchanted Forest
poems.author: Ava Taylor
poems.excerpt: In the enchanted forest, whispers of magic weave through the trees...
poems.full_text: In the enchanted forest, whispers of magic weave through the trees. Faeries dance, unicorns roam, a tapestry of wonder and whimsy. Lose yourself in the labyrinth of dreams, where reality bends and fantasy reigns.
